channel.title: PI Npc Drops Make CMD Run drop
channel.description: I dont know when it would happen but sometimes when a player is killing a npc for a drop and when the npc dies it would drop the item its supposed to drop and then it would make the CMD Prompt Run Crash Down. This is what i get when it crashes down [code] [7/20/12 3:57 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 [7/20/12 3:57 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.dropItems(NPCHandler.jav a:1972) [7/20/12 3:57 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 1685) [7/20/12 3:57 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:189) [7/20/12 3:57 PM]: A fatal exception has been thrown! [7/20/12 3:57 PM]: Saved game for ----. [7/20/12 3:57 PM]: Saved game for -----. [7/20/12 3:57 PM]: Saved game for ----. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] Im not sure what is happening but i dont want this to happen anymor, i really need to fix this. I really need your guys help fixing this. It woul be really appreciated if youve tryed to help me out.

I really need your guys help fixing this. It woul be really appreciated if youve tryed to help me out.[/quote]

@blddyboy wrote:

I dont know when it would happen but sometimes when a player is killing a npc for a drop and when the npc dies it would drop the item its supposed to drop and then it would make the CMD Prompt Run Crash Down. This is what i get when it crashes down
